articles.title: NVIDIA and Lilly Announce Co-Innovation AI Lab to Reinvent Drug Discovery in the Age of AI
articles.summary: NVIDIA and Eli Lilly and Company today announced a first-of-its-kind AI co-innovation lab focused on applying AI to tackle some of the most enduring challenges in the pharmaceutical industry.

articles.title: NVIDIA BioNeMo Platform Adopted by Life Sciences Leaders to Accelerate AI-Driven Drug Discovery
articles.summary: NVIDIA today announced a major expansion of NVIDIA BioNeMoâ„¢, an open development platform that enables lab-in-the-loop workflows to develop breakthroughs in AI-driven biology and drug discovery.

articles.title: Siemens and NVIDIA Expand Partnership to Build the Industrial AI Operating System
articles.summary: Siemens and NVIDIA today announced a significant expansion of their strategic partnership to bring artificial intelligence into the real world.
